list-item.p: Examine the clinical, haematological, biochemical parameters of the patients and correlate them with ribavirin blood levels.
Study the kinetics of LASV loads in blood by reverse-transcription PCR (RT-PCR) and describe the association of drug exposure with the viral kinetics.
Determine LASV sequences and sequence changes during the treatment that might point towards resistant mutants or to increased error rate induced by the nucleoside analogue ribavirin.
